summary: This mod allows you to play as a sovngarde demi-god.  Complete with the glowing effects, and unique racial abilites and powers.
descriptionHtml:
Demigod Race.

\"Sovngarde awaits those who die with a weapon in their hand and courage in their hearts!\" -Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak

v.1 Your character is as tall as a god.  Almost as tall a Tsun Himself.  This may not be to your taste.
v.1.1 Your character is taller than any other race, but is still dwarfed by Tsun.

This is a simple attempt to make a playable Sovngarde hero.  Unlike my playable draugr file, this is a simple copy of the nord race with vastly expanded starting abilites, stats and a godly power. 

Basically; you glow and you can cast divine fury which strips you of your magical resistances while allowing you to detect life, inflict double damage and take half damage.

I KNOW this race is overpowered, playing on anything besides master difficulty is not advised if you do you will get bored quickly.

Intallation: just add the data folder to your skyrim root dirctory and merge when asked. 

Conflicts: None (that I Know of.)

If you want to be a werewolf the you need the werewolf script fix by shooD http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11307.  Otherwise you will be a holy headless ner-do-well

Enjoy
author: ecremer
